meanings.definition: Land consisting of sandy soil with sparse vegetation, typically found near the coast.
meanings.sent1: The linksland by the beach had very little grass and lots of sand.
meanings.sent2: The golfers enjoyed playing on the linksland next to the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The linksland looked like a giant sandbox for the seagulls to play in.
meanings.sent4: The linksland stretched out like a golden carpet along the shore.
meanings.sent5: The linksland shimmered under the sun, inviting all to explore its beauty.

meanings.definition: A golf course built on linksland.
meanings.sent1: The golfers teed off on the linksland with the sound of crashing waves in the background.
meanings.sent2: The linksland provided a challenging terrain for the golfers to navigate.
meanings.sent3: The linksland golf course felt like a secret paradise hidden by the sea.
meanings.sent4: The linksland transformed into a magical kingdom for golf enthusiasts.
meanings.sent5: The linksland whispered tales of victories and defeats to those who walked its fairways.
